Anita Wiredu-Minta (amụrụ na 4 Septemba 1983) bụ onye njikwa bọọlụ nke Ghana, onye ọrụ mbata na mbata na onye bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ. Ọ bụ ugbu a osote onye nkuzi nke otu Ghana Women's Premier League Immigration Ladies na onye njikwa otu maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Ghana. N'oge ọ na-egwu egwu, ọ na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu maka Ghatel Ladies, Immigration Ladies na ndị otu mba Ghana.

Wiredu-Minta bụ onye ọrụ na-ahụ maka mbata na ọpụpụ site na ọrụ. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka Immigration Control Officer 1 (AICO I) site na 2002 ruo 2012, Senior Inspector 2012 ruo 2016, Assistant Superintendent 2IC nke Ghana Immigration Sports site na Apr 2016 ruo Apr 2020
A kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye nlekọta n'okpuru Ghana Immigration Sports n'ọnwa Eprel 2020.
Wiredu-Minta malitere ọrụ ya na Ghatel Ladies, na-egwuri egwu maka ha site na Machị 2001 ruo Ọktoba 2010

O mechara sonye na Immigration Ladies Football Club na 2010 wee laa ezumike nká na 2018. Ọ gbakwara bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana. Ọ gbara bọọlụ na 2006 African Women's Championship na-enyere Ghana aka imecha dị ka onye nke abụọ mgbe Naịjirịa meriri ya na nke ikpeazụ.
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'ịgba bọọlụ, Wiredu-Minta banyere n'ịzụ ndị nkuzi
N'agbata Ọgọstụ 2017 na Septemba 2018, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ọdịmma maka otu ụmụ nwanyị U20 nke Ghana
N'ọnwa Julaị 2019, a họpụtara ya dị ka osote onye nkuzi maka Immigration Ladies Football Club
E buliri ya n'ọkwa onye ọrụ ọdịmma maka ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana (Black Queens).

Wiredu-Minta na-ejekwa ozi na ụlọ ọrụ ndị isi nke Ghana Leagues Clubs Association (GHALCA) dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị. A họpụtakwara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na kọmitii ihe omume na asọmpi na Machị 2021. Ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii ọhụrụ nke GHALCA guzobere First Lady's Cup.
Ọ bụ onye otu mbụ nke Retired Women National Footballers Association of Ghana (RWONFAG) nke ọ na-eje ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke njikọ ahụ.
